title: Scorpion-and-on-and-on, Laker Haters: ACTIVATE 7.2.18
itunes:title: Scorpion-and-on-and-on, Laker Haters: ACTIVATE 7.2.18
description:
In episode 181, Jack and Miles (he's back!!!) are joined by comedian Ify Nwadiwe to discuss LeBron James signing on to the Lakers, Drake's new album Scorpion, culture war updates with Michael Cohen, Sean Hannity, Maxine Waters, Trump's interview with Maria Bartiromo, and more, plus some world cupdate, a soccer team that was trapped in a cave for nine days, and more! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
